title: Research in Collaborative Learning Does Not Serve Cross-Silo Federated Learning in Practice
summary: Cross-silo federated learning (FL) is a promising approach to enable cross-organization collaboration in machine learning model development without directly sharing private data. Despite growing organizational interest driven by data protection regulations such as GDPR and HIPAA, the adoption of cross-silo FL remains limited in practice.
